answers.answer: Not to scare you but my advice would be to go in and get your blood pressure checked hun
Ask your doctor it could be a sign of preeclampsia

question: I'm 35 weeks and two days. FTM. I've had a really bad migraine for the past three days and no amount of Tylenol helps. The other day my face was swollen along with my fingers and feet. Anyone know why this could be?
